itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Libertarian Vice Presidential nominee Spike Cohen as he discusses why he thinks Jo Jorgensen is the right choice for president, why it's important there is a third party candidate, Dan expresses how their tax...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Libertarian Vice Presidential nominee Spike Cohen as he discusses why he thinks Jo Jorgensen is the right choice for president, why it's important there is a third party candidate, Dan expresses how their tax code won't work, and we run through every policy the Libertarian Party believes in.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Libertarian Vice Presidential nominee Spike Cohen as he discusses why he thinks Jo Jorgensen is the right choice for president, why it's important there is a third party candidate, Dan expresses how their tax code won't work, and we run through every policy the Libertarian Party believes in.
